About Us

Discover the luxury and excitement of Phoenixx Casino Goa

Phoenixx Casino - Goa's Most Luxurious Casino

We are proud to be one of Goa's most luxurious casinos, our tag line "Where Luxury Begins and Fortunes Rise" speaks for itself. Located in Hilton Goa Resort, Candolim, we offer unforgettable casino experience for our visitors.

From the moment you step through our doors, you'll be immersed in an atmosphere of elegance and excitement. Our casino features state-of-the-art gaming facilities, exceptional service, and an ambiance that rivals the world's premier gaming destinations.
